bibl.title: After the Past â€“ Essays in Ancient History in Honour of H.W. Pleket
bibl.note: The money-tax collected from homeowners in S.P.P. V, 101 could have been levied to pay for the repairs of the city centre of Hermopolis. The evidence for euergetism in Roman Egypt is meagre at best.
bibl.seg: VAN MINNEN Peter, Hermopolis and the Crisis of the Roman Empire.
Willem JONGMAN and Marc KLEIJWEGT (Ed.), After the Past. Essays in Ancient History in Honour of H.W. Pleket = Mnemosyne. Supplementum. 233 (Leiden, 2001) pp. 285-304.
